int main ( ) { int i , j , t , n , arr [ i ] [ j ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } if ( n == 1 ) printf ( "%d
" , arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; else if ( n == 2 ) printf ( "%d
" , ( arr [ 1 ] [ 0 ] > arr [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ? arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] + arr [ 1 ] [ 0 ] : arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] + arr [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ) ) ; else { for ( i = n - 2 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) arr [ i ] [ j ] += ( arr [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > arr [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ? arr [ i + 1 ] [ j ] : arr [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d
" , ( arr [ 1 ] [ 0 ] > arr [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ? arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] + arr [ 1 ] [ 0 ] : arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] + arr [ 1 ] [ 1 ] ) ) ; } } return 0 ; }
